effects.display_string:
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Wildfire Bomb by 3% stacking up to 6 times. 
Wildfire Bomb has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends, your next Raptor Strike deals 400% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10 sec.

spells.description:
Equip: Dealing damage has a chance to grant you a stack of Deepening Darkness. The Darkness erupts at 5 stacks, dealing 366,700 Shadow damage split among all nearby enemies. Damage increases per target, up to 5. Afterwards, the shadows weigh you down and lower your movement speed by 15% for 5 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ruthless Gladiator's Wristguards of Accuracy

Transmogrified to:
Ruthless Gladiator's Chain Gauntlets

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Turbo-Drain 5000

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities have a chance to drain your target's electrical power, dealing 339,499 Nature damage over 5 sec. If the target dies while being drained, you gain 25% movement speed for 5 sec.

description: The 8th Rule of Commerce: Fast goblins are smart goblins!

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Dark Ranger General's Cloak

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
